pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Flutter SDK 默认从 Github 获取更新，如您访问 Github 速度慢，可以在 Flutter 目录下运行命令："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote set-url origin {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将上游设置为镜像站。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"或者通过下面的命令，直接从 Master 构建渠道检出 Flutter 的 SDK："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone -b master {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
./flutter-sdk/bin/flutter --version"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["您也可以替换上述代码中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"git clone -b"}]," 之后的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"master"}]," 为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"beta"}]," 获取 Beta 渠道的构建、替换为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"dev"}]," 获取 Dev 渠道的构建。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Flutter 镜像使用方法参见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/flutter/","children":"Flutter 镜像安装帮助"}],"。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Flutter SDK 镜像使用帮助
